How to get PDF Expert

PDF Expert is available on macOS and iOS platforms. The app is flexible in the usage options - you can either get PDF Expert for one of the platforms or subscribe to both Mac and iPad/iPhone versions under one joint account. Set up an account for cross-platform app usage

PDF Expert offers a subscription that unlocks Premium features on both Mac and iPhone or iPad. There is no need to buy the apps separately - you get the subscription, set up a joint account and enjoy PDF experience on both platforms! Is PDF Expert available on Windows?

PDF Expert is not available for Windows for now. Currently, we are not planning to develop a Windows version of the app as our developers are focused on the improvements for iOS and macOS versions.
